title: Spirit Guard Udyr bug
body:
Udyr has been using the wrong dialogue on the Spirit Guard Udyr ever after the disable, Phoenix noises come out after using Bear stance or vice versa  for example, one of the wrong quotes while on Phoenix stance is "hear the **BEAR**" 
{{champion:77}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! 

The disable was to address the odd stretching issue that'd been occurring on SGU and Primal Udyr. There's still a couple bugs, like the one you've mentioned in relation to audio that we're working to fix!
yep. this is my main champ/skin - and it's getting annoying. when was the disable?
About two weeks ago i think
